title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for the East Midlands
purpose: Taking advantage of the benefits of the devolution agenda, the East Midlands APPG intends to support a cross-party approach by MPs and Peers, to promote common priorities. and address challenges of growth, infrastructure, flood mitigation and investment.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0115 646 6404.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Rachael Pengelly, East Midlands Councils. Tel: 01664 502624
contact_details.secretariat: East Midlands Councils and East Midlands Chamber of Commerce: jointly act as the group's secretariat.https://www.emcouncils.gov.uk/andhttps://www.emc-dnl.co.uk/
